original_text: The king replied to the astrologers, “This is what I have firmly decided: If you do not tell me what my dream was and interpret it, I will have you cut into pieces and your houses turned into piles of rubble.
korean_text: 왕이 갈대아인들에게 대답하여 이르되 내가 명령을 내렸나니 너희가 만일 꿈과 그 해석을 내게 알게 하지 아니하면 너희 몸을 쪼갤 것이며 너희의 집을 거름더미로 만들 것이요

sentences.original_text: The king replied to the astrologers
This is what I have firmly decided
If you do not tell me what my dream was
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 나의 꿈이 무엇이었는지 말하지 않으면

sentences.original_text: I will have you cut into pieces
and your houses turned into piles of rubble
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희의 집들을 돌무더기로 만들 것이다
